Posts.Title: Treatment question ladyfighter ladyfighter

Posts.Content: ladyfighter wrote: Is there anyone delayed their chemo after lumpectomy or mx? Almost 2 months for me and I'm starting to worry now. Or I shouldn't be worried? Is it normal? How long is too long ?? Lots of miscommunication at my new oncology office. I finally going to see my oncologist Monday but that is way past 2 months of my lumpectomy surgery. I had all tests done bone scan, X-ray, cat scan, sonograms all cleared, lymph nodes all clear , clear margins too. But that was 2 months ago . What do you think? Sometimes I feel so alone that no one understands because not one person in both side of my mom and dad family have breast cancer. I'm the first one. Thank you for reading . Dx 11/16/2011, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Surgery 1/3/2012 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Chemotherapy 3/22/2012 AC Targeted Therapy 5/17/2012 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy 5/17/2012 Taxol (paclitaxel) Targeted Therapy 8/30/2012 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Radiation Therapy 9/25/2012 Breast Hormonal Therapy Arimidex (anastrozole) Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Oct 26, 2012 05:43PM ladyfighter wrote: My oncotype was 69. MO had me on dd AC x 4 and 12 weekly taxol/herceptin and 33 radiations. Due to her2 positive, I'm on herceptin every 3 weeks for a year. I had lumpectomy first before all these treatments. My BS consider me NED after lumpectomy.
